llm_res.rule: approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
transfer function must return a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
llm_res.function: function transfer(address recipient, uint256 amount) public virtual override returns (bool)

llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
